rows.name: Celestial Armor
rows.notes: Creator must be good.

rows.name: Friend Shield (pair)
rows.notes: Sold/works as a pair.

rows.name: Ring of Climbing
rows.notes: Creator must have 5 ranks in Climb.

rows.name: Ring of Climbing, Improved
rows.notes: Creator must have 10 ranks in Climb.

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Air)
rows.notes: Plus all appropriate spells; appears as ring of feather falling until activated.

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Earth)
rows.notes: Plus all appropriate spells; appears as ring of meld into stone until activated.

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Fire)
rows.notes: Plus all appropriate spells; appears as major ring of energy resistance (fire) until activated.

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Water)
rows.notes: Plus all appropriate spells; appears as ring of water walking until activated.

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (greater)
rows.notes: Choose energy type.

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (major)
rows.notes: Choose energy type.

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (minor)
rows.notes: Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

rows.name: Ring of Force Shield
rows.notes: Functions as weightless heavy shield; no ACP/ASF.

rows.name: Ring of Jumping
rows.notes: Creator must have 5 ranks in Jump.

rows.name: Ring of Jumping, Improved
rows.notes: Creator must have 10 ranks in Jump.

rows.name: Ring of Protection +1
rows.notes: Caster level must be at least 3× ring bonus.

rows.name: Ring of Protection +2
rows.notes: Caster level must be at least 3× ring bonus.

rows.name: Ring of Protection +3
rows.notes: Caster level must be at least 3× ring bonus.

rows.name: Ring of Protection +4
rows.notes: Caster level must be at least 3× ring bonus.

rows.name: Ring of Protection +5
rows.notes: Caster level must be at least 3× ring bonus.

rows.name: Ring of Swimming
rows.notes: Creator must have 5 ranks in Swim.

rows.name: Ring of Swimming, Improved
rows.notes: Creator must have 10 ranks in Swim.

rows.name: Ring of Three Wishes
rows.notes: Three rubies; each stores one wish.

rows.name: Rod of Flailing
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of Lordly Might
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of Metal and Mineral Detection
Rod of Negation
rows.notes: Or miracle instead of limited wish.

rows.name: Rod of Python
rows.notes: Creator must be good.
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of the Viper
rows.notes: Creator must be evil.
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of Thunder and Lightning
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of Withering
rows.required_feat: Craft Rod; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Rod of Wonder
rows.notes: Creator must be chaotic.

rows.name: Animated Shield
rows.notes: Animated property

rows.name: Caster's Shield
rows.notes: Creator must be at least 6th level.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Scribe Scroll

rows.name: Dwarven Thrower
rows.notes: Creator must be a dwarf of at least 10th level.

rows.name: Holy Avenger
rows.notes: Creator must be good.

rows.name: Javelin of Lightning
rows.notes: Consumed on use.

rows.name: Oathbow
rows.notes: Creator must be an elf.

rows.name: Shatterspike
rows.notes: Str 13 also required.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Power Attack; Improved Sunder

rows.name: Sun Blade
rows.notes: Creator must be good.

rows.name: Sylvan Scimitar
rows.notes: Alternatively, creator must be a 7th-level druid.
